description:
operating time accumulated from the first use until failure.
Note 1 Operating time to first failure is a special case of operating time to failure (IEV 192-05-01). 

Note 2 In the case of non-repairable items, the operating time to first failure is the operating time to failure (IEV 192-05-01:2015-02.

name.defaultValue: operating time to first failure of an item

i18nValue.en_US: operating time to first failure of an item
